name: Tab Tree for GNOME(Dark Theme)
description: Adwaita-Dark style theme for Tab Tree Firefox extension. Should be used with Firefox-Gnome theme with DarkWDec extension.
additional_info: Download Tab Tree Extension Download GNOME theme for Firefox V1.2 - Added options for tab height and pinned tabs toolbar visibility. V1.1 - Added a small margin around tabs - Fixed new-tab buttons turning completely white on mouse-over - Themed pinned tabs V1.0 - Initial Release
